thread.title: State employees to hold candlelight vigil for slain social worke
thread.title_full: State employees to hold candlelight vigil for slain social worke - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: State employees to hold candlelight vigil for slain social worke
text:
BARRE CITY, Vt. - The Vermont State Employees Union has announced to its members that it will hold a candlelight vigil Sunday night in honor of their slain coworker, Lara Sobel.
Police say Sobel was gunned down by a mother who was upset at losing custody of her child.
Members are asked to meet at the old labor hall in Barre City at 4 p.m. Then they will march to City Place at 5 p.m. That is the state office building where the social worker was murdered on Friday evening as the left work.
